messages.subject: Call For Submissions
messages.msgSnippet: Don t forget to get your blog posts submmitted to the 11th edition of Unschooling Voices, the monthly unschooling blog carnival. The deadline is the last day
messages.messageBody:
Don't forget to get your blog posts submmitted to the 11th edition
of Unschooling Voices, the monthly unschooling blog carnival. The
deadline is the last day of the month. Here's the main link for
details and past editions:
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/2007/01/unschooling-voices-
main-page.html
(If the link doesn't click, copy and paste it into your browser)

The optional question for this month is:
Unschooling through the ages: How, if at all, does unschooling look
different as your child ages and grows. Is it different now than it
was a few years back? What role does age play in unschooling?

Last edition there were 32 posts submitted (32!!!) from unschoolers
at different stages of their unschooling journey. Lots of visitors
found new blogs to read and were inspired to move forward and reach
out and help someone who needed some words of wisdom.

Come join us!

~~ Joanne ~~
